Recycling: I would make sure to recycle all recyclable materials, such as paper, plastic, and glass, to minimize the amount of waste that ends up in landfills.
Reuse: I would try to reuse as many items as possible, such as containers, bags, and clothing, to reduce the need for new products.
Upcycling: I would upcycle items that are no longer useful, such as turning old clothes into rags or repurposing old furniture.
Donation: I would donate items that are still in good condition but no longer needed, such as books, toys, and furniture.
Waste-free shopping: I would try to shop for products with minimal packaging, such as buying fruits and vegetables from local farmers or using reusable bags and containers.
